actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize the documentation of the vessel, Onalay, as a vessel of the United States with coastwise privileges.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to document the vessel Onalay of the Maine Maritime Academy, as a vessel of the United States with the privileges of engaging in coastwise trade.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the documentation of the vessel, Onalay, as a vessel of the United States with coastwise privileges.
